caption: Metric
description: Defines a metric applicable to an agent, capturing quantitative data for analysis and monitoring.
name: metric

name.caption: Metric Name
name.description: The unique name of the metric, identifying the specific measurement being captured (for example, 'CPU Usage' or 'Response Time').

attributes.caption: Attributes
attributes.description: Additional metadata or dimensions associated with the metric, such as tags or labels (for example, 'region' or 'agent_id').

type.caption: Type
type.description: Specifies the type of metric, such as 'counter', 'gauge', or 'histogram', which determines how the metric data is aggregated and interpreted.

unit_of_measurement.caption: Unit of Measurement
unit_of_measurement.description: The unit in which the metric value is reported. Follows the format described by UCUM (Unified Code for Units of Measure) (for example, 'seconds', 'bytes', or 'percentage').

data_points.caption: Data Points
data_points.description: The actual data points collected for the metric, which can be a single value or a collection of values over time.
